column2: BRAVO BLACK TO ALPHA BLACK. BE ADVICED WE ARE SHOWING DROPPING OIL PRESSURE. OVER.
BRAVO TO ALPHA. PRESSURE STILL DROPPING. THIS IS NOT LOOKING GOOD. OVER.
OKAY PRESSURE IS STILL GOING DOWN. WE ARE RTB. OVER.
BRAVO BLACK TO PAPA BEAR. MAYDAY MAYDAY, WE ARE LOSING OIL PRESSURE. SITUATION CRITICAL. RTB. GET THE RESCUE GEAR READY. OVER.
FLAME OUT FLAME OUT! WE ARE GOING DOWN EVERYBODY HOLD TIGHT!;
PAPA BEAR TO BRAVO BLACK. COPY EMERGENCY. ROLLING FIRE EQUIPMENT. YOU ARE CLEARED ALL THE WAY IN. OVER.
